hero.title: Sinterklaas Poems
hero.description: Generate personal and funny Sinterklaas poems for your friends and family. Choose your style and set the friendliness.

recipientName.label: Recipient name
recipientName.description: Enter the name of the person you want to make the poem for. This field is required.

recipientFacts.label: Facts you want to include about the recipient
recipientFacts.placeholder: E.g. Loves coffee, plays guitar, works as a teacher...

classic.label: Classic
classic.description: Strict structure with groups of 4 lines and AABB rhyme structure (e.g. 4+4+4 for 12 lines)

free.label: Free Flowing
free.description: Variable line groups (e.g. 2+3+7) with flexible or optional rhyme

fullyAi.label: Fully AI
fullyAi.description: The poem is generated without human mistakes - perfect and polished

humanize.label: Humanize
humanize.description: The poem contains 2-3 subtle mistakes typical for the age and gender of the writer

tip.title: Tip
tip.text: Lower friendliness gives sharper jokes, higher gives more kind compliments.

errors.rateLimit: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.

empty.title: Nothing generated yet
empty.description: Enter the recipient's name and click "Generate Poem" to start

header.title: Sinterklaas Poems
header.infoAriaLabel: Show instructions for using the Sinterklaas poem generator

instructions.title: How to use
instructions.description: Learn how to use the Sinterklaas poem generator

language.title: 1. Language selection
language.infoText: At the top of the page you'll find two language selectors:
language.infoDescription: "I want info in:" - Choose the language in which you want to see the instructions and interface. This changes all texts on the website (labels, buttons, etc.) to the selected language.
language.poemDescription: "I want my poem in:" - Choose the language in which your poem should be generated. The generated poem will be in this language, independent of the interface language.

recipientName.title: 2. Recipient name
recipientName.text: Enter the name of the person you want to make the poem for. This field is required.

recipientFacts.title: 3. Facts about the recipient
recipientFacts.text: Optional: Add personal facts you want to include in the poem, such as hobbies, interests, or funny anecdotes.

numLines.title: 4. Number of lines
numLines.text: Choose between 4 and 20 lines for your poem. Use the slider to adjust the number.

style.title: 5. Poem style
style.classic: Classic: Strict structure with groups of 4 lines and AABB rhyme structure (e.g. 4+4+4 for 12 lines)
style.free: Free Flowing: Variable line groups (e.g. 2+3+7) with flexible or optional rhyme

aiMode.title: 6. AI Mode
aiMode.fullyAi: Fully AI: The poem is generated without human mistakes - perfect and polished.
aiMode.humanize: Humanize: The poem contains 2-3 subtle mistakes typical for the age and gender of the writer. Enter the age and gender to get an authentic handwritten feel.

friendliness.title: 7. Friendliness
friendliness.intro: Adjust the tone of your poem:
friendliness.spicy: Spicy (0-39): Funny and sharp with a touch of humor

generate.title: 8. Generate and download
generate.text: Click "Generate Poem" to create your personal Sinterklaas poem. You can copy, print, or download the poem as PDF.

feedback.title: 9. Feedback or suggestions?
feedback.text: Have feedback or suggestions? Click the "Contact" button at the bottom of the page to send us a message.
